thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of transferwise.com | 30 of 1820
thread.title: Eirini

author: Eirini
title: Eirini
text: I made two transfers, both from GBP to EUR, one in my account and one to someone else. It was very easy and very fast. The exchange rate was better than the one the banks gave me. The payment transfered to the recipient was correct and everything went well. I would recomment TransferWise for transfering money as the exchange rate is better than a bank's (because of the hidden fees) and it is easy and safe.
